```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(hrbrthemes)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
csv <- read.csv("/Users/User/Desktop/Offline_Challenge_Participation/RawChallengeData/FraymRiskIndicators_Raw&Raster/ethiopia/ethiopia/Ethiopia COVID-19 Risk Scores by Region.csv")
```


```{r}
csv$bool=1
head(csv)
```

```{r}
ggplot(csv, aes(y=ï..Region, x=Average.Socio.economic.Vulnerability.Score)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlim(0, 5) +
  labs(x = "Socio Economic Vulnerability Score", y = "Region", title = "First Plot")
```

```{r}
aggregate(x= csv$Average.Socio.economic.Vulnerability.Score,
          by= list(csv$ï..Region),
          FUN=min)

```
